00047         ((it) ? ldlm_it2str((it)->it_op) : "0")

00052                     struct lookup_intent *it, struct ptlrpc_request **reqp,

00068 static inline struct obd_device *lmv2obd_dev(struct lmv_obd *lmv)
00069 {
00070         return container_of0(lmv, struct obd_device, u.lmv);
00071 }
00072 
00073 static inline struct lmv_tgt_desc *
00074 lmv_get_target(struct lmv_obd *lmv, u32 mdt_idx, int *index)
00075 {
00076         int i;
00077 
00078         for (i = 0; i < lmv->desc.ld_tgt_count; i++) {
00079                 if (lmv->tgts[i] == NULL)
00080                         continue;
00081 
00082                 if (lmv->tgts[i]->ltd_idx == mdt_idx) {
00083                         if (index != NULL)
00084                                 *index = i;
00085                         return lmv->tgts[i];
00086                 }
00087         }
00088 
00089         return ERR_PTR(-ENODEV);
00090 }
00091 
00092 static inline int
00093 lmv_find_target_index(struct lmv_obd *lmv, const struct lu_fid *fid)
00094 {
00095         struct lmv_tgt_desc     *ltd;
00096         u32                     mdt_idx = 0;
00097         int                     index = 0;
00098 
00099         if (lmv->desc.ld_tgt_count > 1) {
00100                 int rc;
00101                 rc = lmv_fld_lookup(lmv, fid, &mdt_idx);
00102                 if (rc < 0)
00103                         return rc;
00104         }
00105 
00106         ltd = lmv_get_target(lmv, mdt_idx, &index);
00107         if (IS_ERR(ltd))
00108                 return PTR_ERR(ltd);
00109 
00110         return index;
00111 }
00112 
00113 static inline struct lmv_tgt_desc *
00114 lmv_find_target(struct lmv_obd *lmv, const struct lu_fid *fid)
00115 {
00116         int index;
00117 
00118         index = lmv_find_target_index(lmv, fid);
00119         if (index < 0)
00120                 return ERR_PTR(index);
00121 
00122         return lmv->tgts[index];
00123 }
00124 
00125 static inline int lmv_stripe_md_size(int stripe_count)
00126 {
00127         struct lmv_stripe_md *lsm;
00128 
00129         return sizeof(*lsm) + stripe_count * sizeof(lsm->lsm_md_oinfo[0]);
00130 }
00131 
00132 static inline const struct lmv_oinfo *
00133 lsm_name_to_stripe_info(const struct lmv_stripe_md *lsm, const char *name,
00134                         int namelen)
00135 {
00136         int stripe_index;
00137 
00138         stripe_index = lmv_name_to_stripe_index(lsm->lsm_md_hash_type,
00139                                                 lsm->lsm_md_stripe_count,
00140                                                 name, namelen);
00141         if (stripe_index < 0)
00142                 return ERR_PTR(stripe_index);
00143 
00144         LASSERTF(stripe_index < lsm->lsm_md_stripe_count,
00145                  "stripe_index = %d, stripe_count = %d hash_type = %x"
00146                  "name = %.*s\n", stripe_index, lsm->lsm_md_stripe_count,
00147                  lsm->lsm_md_hash_type, namelen, name);
00148 
00149         return &lsm->lsm_md_oinfo[stripe_index];
00150 }
00151 
00152 static inline bool lmv_need_try_all_stripes(const struct lmv_stripe_md *lsm)
00153 {
00154         return !lmv_is_known_hash_type(lsm->lsm_md_hash_type) ||
00155                lsm->lsm_md_hash_type & LMV_HASH_FLAG_MIGRATION;
00156 }

00160                 struct lu_fid *fid);
